data.name: UrlTextBoxPlaceholder
data.value: Enter a URL to view in Mobile Preview Tool.
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SPPPLAT-WebPartInfra] Placeholder text for the URL text box in Mobile Preview Tool.

data.name: ScreenReaderMobilePreviewEntered
data.value: You have entered the Mobile Preview Tool. If you want to preview a different page, enter the URL in URL text field. To close the tool and go back to Workbench, press Escape.
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SPPPLAT-WebPartInfra] Screen reader alert for when the user enters Mobile Preview Tool.

data.name: ScreenReaderDevicePickerEntered
data.value: Use left and right arrow keys to choose a device to change the preview screen size.
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SPPPLAT-WebPartInfra] Screen reader alert for when the user enters the device selector in Mobile Preview Tool.

data.name: ScreenReaderDevicePickerSelectionChanged
data.value: Press Enter to choose this device.
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SPPPLAT-WebPartInfra] Screen reader alert for when the user selects a new item in the device selector in Mobile Preview Tool.

data.name: Width
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SPPPLAT-WebPartInfra] The width of the mobile device shown on screen.

data.name: Height
data.comment: [Tag:ODSP-SPPPLAT-WebPartInfra] The height of the mobile device shown on screen.
